title: Player configurations
description: Allows customization for the player behaviours.

impulse.description: Defines the base impulse of the jump.

maxImpulse.description: Defines the maximum impulse of the jump.

impulseMultiplier.description: Defines the multiplier to apply in the base impulse each frame the jump action is performed.

diagonalAngle.description: Defines the angle in degrees to apply when jumping left or right.
